property.name: top_dir
property.description: Directory, where to install the software.

property.name: alternative_download
property.description: List of alternative websites or local cache locations to download the kavetoolbox distribution

property.name: ignore_missing_groups
property.description: KaveToolbox installation fails if yum groups are not available. If you have installed the contents of the groups Development Tools, Additional Development and X Window System manually where needed then you can set this part to True. Otherwise, KaveToolbox installation will fail for sure.

property.name: custom_install_template
property.value:
# ------------------------------- import kavedefaults as cnf
cnf.li.InstallTopDir="{{top_dir}}" cnf.spark.doInstall=False cnf.spark.node=False cnf.spark.workstation=False
# -------------------------------
property.description: KaveToolbox is very customizable. You can turn on and off features and minutely control the install with the CustomInstall.py file Any strings surrounded by double-curled-braces will be replaced by the relevant parameter when written to disk

property.name: command_line_args
property.description: Extra options to pass to the command line installation, for more details on the options read the KaveToolbox readme on github.
